https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hZYv5OZ6dTBtIZUL7fcVhH4WywL.jpg It was during one of our usual visits to this famous bar, or “Library” as we often call it. Jonas Mekas, Julius Ziz, August Varkalis, Moira Tierney and I were engaging in our daily activity – “reading books”, which lasted from dusk till dawn. A Few Drunkards at the Mars Bar
